refnamediv.refpurpose: add application specific data to DH structures

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int DH_get_ex_new_index(long argl, void *argp, CRYPTO_EX_new *new_func, CRYPTO_EX_dup *dup_func, CRYPTO_EX_free *free_func);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: These functions handle application specific data in DH structures. Their usage is identical to that of RSA_get_ex_new_index(), RSA_set_ex_data() and RSA_get_ex_data() as described in RSA_get_ex_new_index 3 .
